products.name: Swift Mouse
products.info: Experience precise and smooth control with the Swift Mouse. Ideal for gaming enthusiasts and professionals.
products.feature: The Swift Mouse features a high-precision sensor, ergonomic design, customizable buttons, and adjustable DPI settings for enhanced gaming performance.

products.name: Blaze Keyboard
products.info: Ignite your gaming experience with the Blaze Keyboard. Designed for maximum comfort and durability.
products.feature: The Blaze Keyboard features mechanical switches, RGB backlighting, programmable macros, and anti-ghosting technology for optimal gaming performance.

products.name: Echo Headset
products.info: Immerse yourself in the game with the Echo Headset. Crystal-clear audio and lightweight design for extended gaming sessions.
products.feature: The Echo Headset delivers immersive 7.1 surround sound, adjustable headband, noise-canceling microphone, and soft ear cushions for exceptional comfort and audio clarity.

products.name: Horizon Monitor
products.info: Unlock the ultimate gaming visual experience with the Horizon Monitor. Stunning visuals and smooth gameplay.
products.feature: The Horizon Monitor offers a curved display, ultra-fast response time, high refresh rate, and HDR technology for immersive gaming visuals and smooth performance.

products.name: Luminous Laptop
products.info: Unleash your gaming potential with the Luminous Laptop. Power-packed performance and portable design.
products.feature: The Luminous Laptop features a high-performance processor, dedicated graphics card, fast storage, and a vibrant display for seamless gaming on-the-go.

products.name: Hyperion Controller
products.info: Elevate your gaming with the Hyperion Controller. Responsive controls and ergonomic design for precision gameplay.
products.feature: The Hyperion Controller offers customizable buttons, wireless connectivity, vibration feedback, and a comfortable grip for immersive gaming experiences on various platforms.

products.name: Gaming T-Shirt
products.info: Show your love for gaming with our stylish Gaming T-Shirt. Comfortable and made with high-quality materials.
products.feature: The Gaming T-Shirt features a unique gaming-inspired design, soft fabric, and a relaxed fit for casual and comfortable wear during gaming sessions or everyday activities.

products.name: Gaming Hoodie
products.info: Stay warm and fashionable with our Gaming Hoodie. Perfect for gaming enthusiasts and those who love stylish gaming apparel.
products.feature: The Gaming Hoodie combines comfort and style with a cozy interior, drawstring hood, spacious pockets, and a gaming-themed design to keep you warm and stylish during gaming or outdoor activities.

products.name: Gaming Poster
products.info: Decorate your gaming space with our captivating Gaming Poster. A must-have for every gaming enthusiast.
products.feature: The Gaming Poster showcases stunning artwork and graphics that capture the essence of gaming. Hang it on your wall to enhance the gaming atmosphere and inspire your gaming adventures.

products.name: Hyperion Mousepad
products.info: Enhance your gaming experience with the Hyperion Gaming Mousepad.
products.feature: Large surface area, smooth and precise tracking, and non-slip rubber base for optimal mouse control.

products.name: HyperX SSD
products.info: Boost your gaming performance with the HyperX Gaming SSD.
products.feature: High-speed storage, large capacity, and enhanced reliability for faster game loading times and smoother gameplay.

products.name: Pixel Mug
products.info: Enjoy your favorite beverage in style with the Pixel Gaming Mug.
products.feature: High-quality ceramic material, gaming-inspired pixel art design, and comfortable grip handle for a perfect gaming companion.
